heroComp.title: Seamless Freelance Collaboration
heroComp.subTitle: Connect with talented freelancers or clients in Uzbekistan, using tools designed to ensure trust and efficiency every step of the way.

escowComp.subTitle: With 1good’s Escrow system, payments are held securely until the project is approved. Freelancers get paid reliably, and clients only release funds when satisfied—building trust effortlessly.

weWorkComp.title: How We Work: SEO Process
weWorkComp.subTitle: Our step-by-step SEO process ensures your website ranks higher, attracts more traffic, and drives lasting results.

weWorkData.title: Project Setup
weWorkData.description: Clients start by posting their project needs—defining the scope, budget, and timeline. Our AI Assistant helps create a clear brief to attract the right freelancers.

weWorkData.title: Proposal Matching
weWorkData.description: Freelancers submit proposals tailored to the project. Clients review these offers, comparing skills and rates to find the best match for their needs.

weWorkData.title: Agreement Creation
weWorkData.description: Once a freelancer is chosen, our platform generates a legally binding contract with project details, ensuring both parties are aligned and protected.

weWorkData.title: Secure Payment
weWorkData.description: Clients deposit funds into Escrow, keeping payments safe until the project is complete. This builds trust, knowing freelancers will be paid upon approval.

weWorkData.title: Collaboration & Delivery
weWorkData.description: Freelancers and clients work together using our dashboard to track progress. Once the work is submitted, clients review and approve the deliverables.

weWorkData.title: Payment Release
weWorkData.description: After approval, funds are released from Escrow to the freelancers. Both parties can leave feedback to build trust for future projects.
